/93025-5Protocol for Responding to and Assessing Patients' Assets, Risks, and Experiences [PRAPARE]0..1group
/93043-8Personal characteristics0..1group

/93043-8/32624-9Race0..*choiceOptions: 8 options
/93043-8/93035-4At any point in the past 2 years, has season or migrant farm work been your or your family's main source of income?0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
/93043-8/93034-7Have you been discharged from the armed forces of the United States?0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
/93043-8/54899-0Preferred language0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
/93042-0Family and home0..1group
/93042-0/63512-8How many people are living or staying at this address?0..1integer
/93042-0/71802-3Housing status0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
/93042-0/71802-3-helpDescribes patients living arrangement0..1display
/93042-0/93033-9Are you worried about losing your housing?0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
/93042-0/56799-0Address0..1string
/93041-2Money and resources0..1group
/93041-2/82589-3Highest level of educ0..1choiceOptions: 4 options
/93041-2/67875-5Employment status current0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
/93041-2/76437-3Primary insurance0..1choiceOptions: 7 options
/93041-2/63586-2What was your best estimate of the total income of all family members from all sources, before taxes, in last year?0..1decimal
/93041-2/93031-3In the past year, have you or any family members you live with been unable to get any of the following when it was really needed?0..*choiceOptions: 8 options
/93041-2/93030-5Has lack of transportation kept you from medical appointments, meetings, work, or from getting things needed for daily living0..*choiceOptions: 4 options
/93040-4Social and emotional health0..1group
/93040-4/93029-7How often do you see or talk to people that you care about and feel close to (For example: talking to friends on the phone, visiting friends or family, going to church or club meetings)?0..1choiceOptions: 5 options
/93040-4/93038-8Stress is when someone feels tense, nervous, anxious or can't sleep at night because their mind is troubled. How stressed are you?0..1choiceOptions: 6 options
/93039-6Optional additional questions0..1group
/93039-6/93028-9In the past year, have you spent more than 2 nights in a row in a jail, prison, detention center, or juvenile correctional facility?0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
/93039-6/93027-1Are you a refugee?0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
/93039-6/93026-3Do you feel physically and emotionally safe where you currently live?0..1choiceOptions: 4 options
/93039-6/76501-6Within the last year, have you been afraid of your partner or ex-partner?0..1choiceOptions: 2 options
